tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PatientReadmission (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE,
  readmission_date DATE,
  readmission_reason TEXT,
  discharge_policy_evaluation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  admission_date TIMESTAMP,
  discharge_date TIMESTAMP,
  readmission_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE Hospitalizations (
  hospitalization_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE,
  hospitalization_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Readmissions (
  readmission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  hospitalization_id UUID REFERENCES Hospitalizations(hospitalization_id),
  readmission_date DATE,
  reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_age INT,
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Admissions (
  admission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE,
  admission_reason VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Readmissions (
  readmission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  readmission_date DATE,
  readmission_reason VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Policies (
  policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_name VARCHAR(50),
  policy_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyAssignments (
  assignment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id UUID,
  patient_id UUID,
  assignment_date DATE
)
